name: Raise from the Ashes
description: The game is about the phoenix bird based upon the poem "The sun begins to rise and the bird begins to stretch. Its feathers are a beautiful hue of gold and red – the Phoenix. It cranes its head back as it sings a haunting melody that stops the sun itself in the sky. A spark falls from the heavens and ignites a great fire that consumes both bird and nest – but don’t worry. In three days, the Phoenix will rise from the ashes – born again." The objective of the game is to collect all the feathers and then climb all the way to the top of the phoenix bird's nest without falling down. In spite of getting burnt in the fire, the bird rises back from its ashes and continues the journey again...
